Phrase module¶

class phrase.Phrase(tempo=120, debug=False, endless=False)¶

Bases: object

Default constructor for Phrase.

Parameters

  • tempo (int) – Tempo of phrase

  • debug (boolean) – Whether or not to display debug info when playing

  • endless (boolean) – Whether or not phrase will exit program after finishing

Returns
